body: Hi all, For some of you who are interested in case studies of using analysis and optimization here is a recent publication which is using Ladybug and [Galapagos](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/galapagos) for geometry optimization. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/CDpOn5M7-BsbHTE5CxJX7jMTGlj5iZFOMbvskLEPYunVMn7ubZGdYsSl257c-vCYXNgmqDcxkGbcvRpRxH7NF8a0OvPl-6Ex/AgentBasedGeometryOptimizationForSolarLight.jpg) You can read and download the full paper from this link: [Yun Kyu Yi, Hyoungsub Kim, Agent-based geometry optimization with G...](http://authors.elsevier.com/a/1QS-Q,tRcsG2M) The paper is available for free download until March 21! Also Dr. Yi shared an example with me on a similar topic last year which took me for ever to update! I attached the updated definition. [Here is the the .pdf file](https://www.dropbox.com/s/wa8k9t815m290rs/LADYBUG-YUNKYUYI.pdf?dl=0) for anyone who is interested. My apologies for the delay! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/CDpOn5M7-Bu9rUppc8WVpUt9waCn*KkWSfU7mljGQxPMu5-4LLXlBc4XGY7NhlUvBei4NfQUnvN*Y3Z2zcRbQnEDH0XD0SDF/Capture.PNG) **Again all the credit for the paper goes to Yun Kyu Yi and Hyoungsub Kim and for the example file goes to Yun Kyu Yi and his class ARCH-632 Performance & Design - Parametric Integration at University of Pennsylvania. I'm just sharing them here.** Happy #ValentinesDay! Mostapha
